channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road markings worn, 4th October
item.description:
The road marking for cars turn off Cheltenham Road East to either Innsworth Lane or Parton are not visible at night. Carsusing this junction at night, that are not familiar with the layout, are waiting to turn on dangerous positions on the road. It is an accident waiting to happen.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Devereaux Court Innsworth Lane, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Curbstone has somehow risen up I’m now provides a trip hazard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 34 Church Road, Saint Marks

item.title: Illegal parking, 4th October

item.title: Pavement obstructed by overhanging brambles St Paul’s Road, 3rd October
item.description:

item.title: Road surface in really bad condition, 3rd October
item.description:
The whole of Robert Burns Avenue in Cheltenham has potholes and uneven surfaces around the speed bumps. It's really difficult for cyclists in particular.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Robert Burns Avenue, Cheltenham

item.title: 2022 re-planting/smarten project?, 2nd October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 56 Folly Lane, Cheltenham

item.title: Cars going the wrong way., 29th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 52 Alstone Avenue, Cheltenham
